abstract: Cheryl’s Birthday was a puzzle sensation several weeks ago. Can you now figure out Cheryl’s age?
snippet: Cheryl’s Birthday was a puzzle sensation several weeks ago. Can you now figure out Cheryl’s age?
lead_paragraph: This week’s puzzle was suggested by Kenneth Kong, a television host in Singapore. The challenge is a follow-up to the Cheryl’s Birthday Problem, which Kenneth sent viral several weeks ago after posting it to Facebook.

headline.main: Kenneth Kong Presents Cheryl’s Birthday — Part 2
